name: Webpage HTML Export
description: Webpage HTML Export is a plugin for Obsidian which lets you export single files or whole vaults as HTML websites / webpages. It is similar to publish, but you get the .html files to do whatever you want with. Its goal is to support as many features of obsidian possible including themes, dataview, graph view, and more.
author: Nathan George
updateNote:
MAJOR UPDATES
- Fixed export breaking on obsidian v1.4.0+
- Added canvas support!
- Added excalidraw support!
- Full mobile support!
- Collapsible sidebars!
- Ability to only export modified files!
- File picker to include or exclude spicific files!
- Labels on all graph view nodes
- Minify files for faster loading
- and more!
